mapper.select: select MEM_ID , MEM_NICKNAME , mem_originalfile , mem_savefile from cs_member where MEM_ID like'%' || #{word}|| '%' or mem_nickname like '%' || #{word} ||'%'
select count(*) as COUNT , tag_name from cs_board_tag where tag_name like '%' || #{word}|| '%' group by tag_name
select tag_name map_id from cs_mymap_tag where tag_name like'%' || #{word}|| '%'

select boa_id , boa_latitude , boa_longitude from cs_board where (mem_id=#{0} or mem_id in ( select fol_following from cs_follow where fol_follower=#{0})) and to_number(boa_latitude) between #{3} and #{1} and to_number(boa_longitude) between #{4} and #{2} and boa_delete_date is null order by boa_create_date desc
select boa_id from cs_board_tag where tag_name =#{tagName}
select boa_id from cs_board where mem_id =#{userId}
select map_id from cs_mymap_tag where tag_name =#{mymapTag}

select distinct tag_name from cs_board_tag
where tag_name like '%' ||#{0}|| '%'
select boa_id from CS_BOARD where boa_id IN (select boa_id from cs_board_like where mem_id = #{mem_id}) and boa_delete_date is null
